note:
Hello I'm Lee, been writing poetry and short stories since the age of 9. My poetry is mainly free verse aimed at a younger audience but fun for all, a bit of relief over the past few darker years. My influences are Dr Suess, Edward Lear, Spike Milligan etc.

I do occasionally write more serious poetry and I'm also working on a few other projects.

I live in Glasshoughton near Castleford with my Wife Sarah and our bearded dragon Pepper.
